definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: We have targeted two principal market sectors with our equipment: agriculture and light industrial construction applications worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 公司的產品遍及世界農業和輕工業工程設備市場。

sentences.english: Pauticularly suitable for light industry, electronics and other products stored light.
sentences.chinese: 特別適合輕工業，電子電器等產品的存放。

sentences.english: Wr are a state-operated corporation handling light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我們是經營輕工業產品的國營公司。

sentences.english: Some countries envy us our rapid development of light industry.
sentences.chinese: 有些國家羨慕我國輕工業的飛速發展。

sentences.english: The Chinese light industry was revitalized in the 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 中國輕工業在20世紀80年代重新振興起來。

sentences.english: The light art design of engineering institute of Zhengzhou will be to graduate from in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 2005年畢業於鄭州輕工業學院藝術設計系。

sentences.english: We have the pleasure of introducing ourselves to your as a state-operated corporation dealing exclusively in light industrial goods.
sentences.chinese: 我們有幸自薦，我們是一家專營輕工業品的有限公司。

sentences.english: Light industry is closely related to agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 輕工業和農業密切相關。

sentences.english: China National Light Import & Export Corporation Wants To open up a new market abroad for them.
sentences.chinese: 中國輕工業品進出口總公司想在國外打開市場。

sentences.english: I am responsible for exporting light industrial machinery to some Asian and European countries.
sentences.chinese: 我負責向一些亞洲和歐洲國家出口輕工業機械產品。

sentences.english: We rang up the Ceramics Section of Light Industrial Products Import & Export Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾打電話給輕工業品公司陶瓷品部。

sentences.english: We handle a wide range of light industrial products as per list enclosed.
sentences.chinese: 我們經營多種輕工業品，詳見附表。

sentences.english: The arrangement of light industry in the province needs adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 那個省的輕工業佈局需要調整。

sentences.english: Agriculture has developed rapidly, thus providing light industry with ample raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 農業迅速發展，從而爲輕工業提供了充足的原料。

sentences.english: Light industry researcher Zhu Qinghua investment consultants said.
sentences.chinese: 中投顧問輕工業研究員朱慶驊說。

definition: Four Asian Tigers/East Asian Tigers/Four Little Dragons (East Asian economic powers: Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore and Hong Kong)
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
